Reference

Basic dashboard functions

Dashboard skeleton functions

bs4DashPage() dashboardPage()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard page

bs4DashNavbar() dashboardHeader()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard navbar

bs4DashBody() dashboardBody()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard body

bs4DashFooter() dashboardFooter()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard footer

bs4DashSidebar() dashboardSidebar()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard main sidebar

bs4DashControlbar() dashboardControlbar()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard right sidebar

bs4TabPanel() bs4DashControlbarItem() tabPanel()

Create a tabPanel

bs4TabSetPanel() bs4DashControlbarMenu() tabsetPanel()

Create a tabSetPanel

Layout functions

Bootstrap 4 Layout utils

column()

Boostrap 4 column system

Feedback related functions

Bootstrap 4 popovers, tooltips, …

bs4PopoverServer()

Create a Bootstrap 4 Popover from the server side

bs4PopoverUI()

Create a Bootstrap 4 Popover from the UI side

bs4TooltipServer()

Create a Bootstrap 4 Tooltip from the server side

bs4TooltipUI()

Create a Bootstrap 4 Tooltip from the UI side

Update functions

Dynamically update UI elements

updatebs4Card()

update an AdminLTE3 card from the server side

updatebs4CardSidebar() updateCardSidebar()

Programmatically toggle a bs4Card sidebar

updatebs4Controlbar()

Function to programmatically toggle the state of the controlbar

updatebs4TabSetPanel() updatebs4ControlbarMenu() updateTabsetPanel()

Update a bs4TabSetPanel

updatebs4Sidebar()

Function to programmatically toggle the state of the sidebar

updatebs4TabItems() updateTabItems()

Change the selected sidebar tab on the client

Body content functions

Functions that are to be used in the bs4DashBody

bs4TabItems() tabItems()

A container for tab items

bs4TabItem() tabItem()

One tab to put inside a tab items container

Sidebar Content functions

Functions that are to be used in the bs4DashSidebar

bs4SidebarMenu() sidebarMenu()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard main sidebar menu

bs4SidebarMenuItem() menuItem()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard main sidebar menu item

bs4SidebarMenuSubItem() menuSubItem()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard main sidebar menu sub-item

bs4SidebarHeader() sidebarHeader()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard main sidebar header

bs4SidebarUserPanel() sidebarUserPanel()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard main sidebar user panel

Navbar Content functions

Functions that are to be used in the bs4DashNavbar

bs4DropdownMenu() dropdownMenu()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard dropdown menu

bs4DropdownMenuItem() dropdownMenuItem()

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard dropdown menu item

bs4UserMenu()

Create a Bootstrap 4 user profile.

Cards and boxes

Build cards and boxes

bs4Box()

AdminLTE3 simple box

bs4InfoBox() infoBox()

Boostrap 4 info box

bs4ValueBox() valueBox()

Boostrap 4 value box

bs4Card() box()

Create a Boostrap 4 card

bs4CardLabel()

Create a label for Boostrap 4 card

bs4CardSidebar() cardSidebar()

Create a sidebar for Boostrap 4 card

bs4TabCard() tabBox()

Create a Boostrap 4 tabCard

bs4UserCard()

AdminLTE3 widget user card

bs4SocialCard()

AdminLTE3 social card

Card Toolbar components

Build dropdown menu in the tool area (close, collapse)

dropdownDivider()

Create a box dropdown divider

dropdownItem()

Create a box dropdown item

dropdownItemList()

Create a box dropdown item list

Tab card elements

Functions that are to be used in bs4TabCard

bs4InsertTab()

Insert a bs4TabPanel in a bs4TabSetPanel

bs4RemoveTab()

Remove a bs4TabPanel in a bs4TabSetPanel

bs4TabPanel() bs4DashControlbarItem() tabPanel()

Create a tabPanel

bs4TabSetPanel() bs4DashControlbarMenu() tabsetPanel()
